00085    // Private inline methods.
00086 
00087    inline int RingTetraRebridgeMove::modId(int id, int n)
00088    {
00089       if (id >= n) id = id%n;
00090       if (id < 0) id = n - (-id)%n;
00091       return id;
00092    }
